title: I need 17 rp
body:
i have 273 rp and i need 17 rp for the chroma of Arcade Miss Fortune (peridot). in some forums i saw that i could make a drawing for some rp. where I can send it? A guy told me that i need to send it in aticket to player support but i dont know where is that. Thank you for help me!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  Have a nice day!

replies.body:
That guy was correct, and you can reach our support specialists in a ticket with [this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
